document_title: What is hair loss? 15 Common causes and signs
subsection_name: rung-toc.json_10_Effective way to prevent hair loss
subsection_content:
To prevent hair loss, patients should note the following:
A healthy diet, fully supplemented with essential nutrients for the body; Limit tension and stress, keep a comfortable and cheerful mood; Check and screen for thyroid diseases or other autoimmune diseases; Avoid tying your hair too tightly; While having chemotherapy, try wearing a cooling cap.
